Detailed Description

Packet for altering data about a User.

{tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 2 bytes & nbrElements \ +2 & 4 bytes & changerUIN \ for each element & data & UserElemtChanges \ {tabular}

Create a change user request packet.

Parameters:
packetID The ID of this packet.
requestID The ID of the reuest that whants the reply of this request packet.
UIN The identification of the user.
changerUIN The UIN for the user changing the user.

Get the next user in this packet.

This method should be used together with getFirstElementPosition().
